markdown:
**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 165 1.1 **Prerequisites** Expert in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) --- Your panache allows you to perform incredible feats: climbing, swimming, and leaping far beyond your normal capacity. While you have panache, you gain the following benefits.
  • You gain climb and swim Speeds equal to half your land Speed.
  • The DCs of your [High Jumps](/Actions.aspx?ID=2377) and [Long Jumps](/Actions.aspx?ID=2378) decrease by 10. This doesn't combine with other abilities that reduce those DCs.
  • The distance you can move with a vertical [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=2298) increases to 5 feet. Your distance for a horizontal Leap increases to 15 feet if your Speed is at least 15 feet, or to 20 feet if your Speed is at least 30 feet.
Flamboyant Athlete leads to... [Flamboyant Leap](/Feats.aspx?ID=6172)
